pullRequest.title: Arrows Stuck
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This PR allows users to set/get the number of arrows stuck in any LivingEntity. Why not?

Target Minecraft Versions:     Any (I think - methodExists() is used)
Requirements:     Paper
Related Issues:     #1655

commit.message:
Merge pull request #12 from SkriptLang/master

Merge Upstream

nodes.bodyText: wouldn't it be nice to have add 1 to arrows stuck in player? this syntax doesn't allow that
